text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/54ed0dff2913f9c973f6ab04b3c96372bdf07406|patch 8.2.0702: running channel tests may leave running process behind>
patch 8.2.0702: running channel tests may leave running process behind

Problem:    Running channel tests may leave running process behind.
Solution:   Make Python client exit when running into EOF. (Kurtis Rader,
            part of #6046)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0702: running channel tests may leave running process behind · vim/vim@54ed0df
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0702: running channel tests may leave running process behind · vim/vim@54ed0df
attachments.text: Problem: Running channel tests may leave running process behind. Solution: Make Python client exit when running into EOF. (Kurtis Rader, part of #6046)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b68b346e6db6d3f848e0a89905fcd7777b73c5d8|patch 8.2.0703: Vim9: closure cannot store value in outer context>
patch 8.2.0703: Vim9: closure cannot store value in outer context

Problem:    Vim9: closure cannot store value in outer context.
Solution:   Make storing value in outer context work.  Make :disassemble
            accept a function reference.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0703: Vim9: closure cannot store value in outer context · vim/vim@b68b346
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0703: Vim9: closure cannot store value in outer context · vim/vim@b68b346
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: closure cannot store value in outer context. Solution: Make storing value in outer context work. Make :disassemble accept a function reference.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f821ddaa0c27230012a6bffbec6fb0ab2f101171|patch 8.2.0704: Vim9: memory leak in disassemble test>
patch 8.2.0704: Vim9: memory leak in disassemble test

Problem:    Vim9: memory leak in disassemble test.
Solution:   Decrement refcount when creating funccal.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0704: Vim9: memory leak in disassemble test · vim/vim@f821dda
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0704: Vim9: memory leak in disassemble test · vim/vim@f821dda
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: memory leak in disassemble test. Solution: Decrement refcount when creating funccal.

patch 8.2.0705: indent tests don't run on CI for FreeBSD

Problem:    Indent tests don't run on CI for FreeBSD.
Solution:   Set modeline. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #6048)

attachments.text: Problem: Indent tests don't run on CI for FreeBSD. Solution: Set modeline. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #6048)

patch 8.2.0706: Vim9: using assert_fails() causes function to finish

Problem:    Vim9: using assert_fails() causes function to finish.
Solution:   Check did_emsg instead of called_emsg.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0706: Vim9: using assert_fails() causes function to finish · vim/vim@8a1c101
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0706: Vim9: using assert_fails() causes function to finish · vim/vim@8a1c101
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: using assert_fails() causes function to finish. Solution: Check did_emsg instead of called_emsg.
